titleStmt.title: A friendly accomodation in the fore-debated controversie between Mr. Bedford and the author: wherein is manifested that the differences, are few and small; and those continued with mutual respect and love.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Plain Scripture proof of infants church-membership and baptism.

notesStmt.note: Originally part of: Plain Scripture proof of infants church-membership and baptism / by Richard Baxter.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.

With: Praefestinantis morator. Or Mr. Tombs his præcursor. London, : [s.n.], Printed in the year, 1652 -- Letters that passed between Mr. Baxter and Mr. Tombes concerning the dispute. London, : [s.n.], Printed in the year, 1652.
